title: Better Sleep with Frank Lipman, MD
description:
In episode #161 I sit down with Frank Lipman, Md to talk about why we should be taking sleep more seriously and how to improve it.

Specifically we cover:

What sleep is

The different phases of sleep

Different reasons for sleep abnormalities

Wearables and sleep

Sleep quantity (hours slept) versus sleep quality

Microbiome and sleep

Light exposure and sleep

Meal timing and sleep

Supplements and sleep

Alcohol and sleep

and much more
